main event: Two unidentified flying objects were observed near Ashiya Air Base in Japan on August 1, 1952.
interesting points: One object was seen for approximately one second at 75 feet altitude by a pilot,The object appeared to be one-third the size of the moon and flew at a high speed in a level westerly course,There were no reports from ground observers or other pilots about the object,Weather officer suggested unusual natural physical conditions might account for the sighting,Fireworks were being displayed in the town of Ashiya around the same time.
